Package socialmagnet.dao

Class FarmerDAO

java.lang.Object
socialmagnet.dao.FarmerDAO
public class FarmerDAO
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents the Farmer DAO. Initialised using values from the SQL Database

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FarmerDAO()
    Create a FarmerDAO

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addToInventory​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String cropName, int quantity)
    Adds a new crop and its quantity into the inventory belonging to the specified username
    void initializeHashMaps()
    Initialises 2 HashMaps, rankNameXpMapping which maps xp as the keys and rankName as values, and xpPlotsMapping which maps xp as keys and plots as values
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> readRankNameXpMapping()
    Returns the RankNameXpMapping Map object
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> readXpPlotsMapping()
    Returns the RankNameXpMapping Map object
    Farmer retrieveFarmer​(java.lang.String username)
    Initialises and Returns the Farmer object from the SQL Database that have the inputted username
    Farmer retrieveFarmerFactory​(java.lang.String username)
    Returns the Farmer object that have the inputted username and updates the Rank and Maximum number of plots of that Farmer
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> retrieveInventory​(java.lang.String username)
    Returns the Map object that represents the user's inventory
    int setXpDenomination​(int currentXp)
    Sets the Xp denomination based on the user's current xp
    void updateGold​(java.lang.String username, int gold)
    Updates the amount of gold belonging to the specified username
    void updateInventory​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String cropName, int quantity)
    Updates the quantity of the specified crop in the inventory belonging to the specified username
    void updateRankAndPlots​(java.lang.String username, Farmer farmer)
    Updates the Rank and Maximum number of plots of the Farmer object that belongs to the specified username
    void updateXp​(java.lang.String username, int xp)
    Updates the amount of xp of the specified username

    • retrieveInventory

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> retrieveInventory​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns the Map object that represents the user's inventory
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the username
      Returns:
      A Map object that maps Strings representing the crop name as keys, and integers representing the quantity as values

    • updateRankAndPlots

      public void updateRankAndPlots​(java.lang.String username, Farmer farmer)
      Updates the Rank and Maximum number of plots of the Farmer object that belongs to the specified username
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the username of the user whose rank and maximum number of plots is to be updated
      farmer - The Farmer object to be updated

    • updateInventory

      public void updateInventory​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String cropName, int quantity)
      Updates the quantity of the specified crop in the inventory belonging to the specified username
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the username
      cropName - A String representing the crop name
      quantity - An integer representing the quantity of crop to be updated with

      gold - An integer representing the amount of gold to be updated with

    • addToInventory

      public void addToInventory​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String cropName, int quantity)
      Adds a new crop and its quantity into the inventory belonging to the specified username
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the username
      cropName - A String representing the name of the crop to be added
      quantity - An integer representing the quantity of the crop to be added

    • initializeHashMaps

      public void initializeHashMaps()
      Initialises 2 HashMaps, rankNameXpMapping which maps xp as the keys and rankName as values, and xpPlotsMapping which maps xp as keys and plots as values

    • setXpDenomination

      public int setXpDenomination​(int currentXp)
      Sets the Xp denomination based on the user's current xp
      Parameters:
      currentXp - An integer representing the current xp of the user
      Returns:
      An integer representing the xp denomination

    • readRankNameXpMapping

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> readRankNameXpMapping()
      Returns the RankNameXpMapping Map object
      Returns:
      A Map object with the xp as the key and rank name as the value

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> readXpPlotsMapping()
      Returns the RankNameXpMapping Map object
      Returns:
